headline: A Look At CoStar Group (CSGP) Valuation As Longer Term Returns Lag Recent Gains
summary: CoStar Group stock snapshot and recent performance CoStar Group (CSGP) has attracted attention after recent share price swings, with the stock around $49.87. Returns over the past month and past 3 months show double digit declines, alongside a weaker 1 year performance. See our latest analysis for CoStar Group. CoStar Group’s recent 1 day and 7 day share price gains sit against weaker longer term share price returns, while the 1 year, 3 year, and 5 year total shareholder returns remain...
